name: Soulblast
text:
As an additional cost to cast Soulblast, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Soulblast deals damage to target creature or player equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

name: Soul Bleed
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

editions.flavor: Whether the end comes swift or slow, it always comes too soon.

name: Soulbound Guardians
text: Defender, flying

editions.flavor: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.

name: Soulbright Flamekin
text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra
editions.flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.
When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.
When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

name: Soul Burn
text:
Spend only black and/or red mana on X.
Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

name: Soulcage Fiend
text: When Soulcage Fiend dies, each player loses 3 life.

editions.flavor: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.

name: Soulcatcher
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

editions.flavor: "Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."
"Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."

"Holy couriers guide aven spirits up to the home of the Ancestor."
—Mystic elder

name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
text:
Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.

name: Soul Channeling
text:
Enchant creature
Pay 2 life: Regenerate enchanted creature.

editions.flavor: Driven by masters more terrible than the Mercadians could imagine, the dark overseers would pay any price to keep their shipwrights working.

name: Soul Charmer
text: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.

editions.flavor: She seeks the warmth of the living.

name: Soul Collector
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
Morph {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Soul Conduit
text: {6}, {T}: Two target players exchange life totals.

editions.flavor:
"You have an unhealthy attachment to your selfhood. I can help you with that."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Souldrinker
text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Souldrinker.

editions.flavor: Don't drink and thrive.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic
editions.flavor: Don't drink and thrive.
Don't drink and thrive.

name: Soul Echo
text:
Soul Echo enters the battlefield with X echo counters on it.
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Soul Echo if there are no echo counters on it. Otherwise, target opponent may choose that for each 1 damage that would be dealt to you until your next upkeep, you remove an echo counter from Soul Echo instead.

name: Soul Exchange
text:
As an additional cost to cast Soul Exchange, exile a creature you control.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +2/+2 counter on that creature if the exiled creature was a Thrull.

name: Soul Feast
text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

editions.flavor: As no one has ever accepted a second invitation to Davvol's table, the evincar often dines alone.
You are who you eat.
Evil often dines alone.
You are who you eat.
You are who you eat.

"I smell the tang of a mortal's fresh blood. I hear it sliding wetly beneath its skin. My hunger cannot refuse the invitation."
—Yuri, Sengir vampire

name: Soulfire Grand Master
text:
Lifelink
Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
{2}{U/R}{U/R}: The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, put that card into your hand instead of into your graveyard as it resolves.

name: Soulflayer
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
If a creature card with flying was exiled with Soulflayer's delve ability, Soulflayer has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, reach, trample, and vigilance.

name: Soul Foundry
text:
Imprint — When Soul Foundry enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand.
{X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

name: Soulgorger Orgg
text:
Trample
When Soulgorger Orgg enters the battlefield, you lose all but 1 life.
When Soulgorger Orgg leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it entered the battlefield.

name: Soul Kiss
text:
Enchant creature
{B}, Pay 1 life: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

name: Soulless One
text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.

editions.flavor: "Surrender your soul to me."
"Surrender your soul to me."

name: Soulless Revival
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Soul Link
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.

editions.flavor: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

name: Soul Manipulation
text:
Choose one or both —
• Counter target creature spell.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Soulmender
text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

editions.flavor: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."
"Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

name: Soul Net
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

name: Soul Nova
text: Exile target attacking creature and all Equipment attached to it.

editions.flavor: Within seconds, the nim was consumed in blinding sunfire. Afterwards, only a puddle of molten iron remained.

name: Soul of Innistrad
text:
Deathtouch
{3}{B}{B}: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
{3}{B}{B}, Exile Soul of Innistrad from your graveyard: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Soul of Magma
text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Soul of Magma deals 1 damage to target creature.

editions.flavor:
"In every other mind, the battle was lost. General Takeno alone was not touched by despair. Drawing his blade, he was attack and rallying cry in one."
—Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale

name: Soul of New Phyrexia
text:
Trample
{5}: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
{5}, Exile Soul of New Phyrexia from your graveyard: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

name: Soul of Ravnica
text:
Flying
{5}{U}{U}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.
{5}{U}{U}, Exile Soul of Ravnica from your graveyard: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.

name: Soul of Shandalar
text:
First strike
{3}{R}{R}: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player controls.
{3}{R}{R}, Exile Soul of Shandalar from your graveyard: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player controls.

name: Soul of the Harvest
text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

editions.flavor: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.
It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.

name: Soul of Theros
text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn.
{4}{W}{W}, Exile Soul of Theros from your graveyard: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn.

name: Soul of Zendikar
text:
Reach
{3}{G}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
{3}{G}{G}, Exile Soul of Zendikar from your graveyard: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

name: Soul Parry
text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

editions.flavor:
"I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."
—Elspeth

"I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Soulquake
text: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor: The Maelstrom sent a wave of raw mana through the battlefield, carrying off the fighting and fallen alike.

name: Soul Ransom
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

name: Soul Reap
text: Destroy target nongreen creature. Its controller loses 3 life if you've cast another black spell this turn.

editions.flavor: Their thoughtweft carried Darial's last thoughts back to his doun. They sorely wished it had not.

name: Soul Rend
text:
Destroy target creature if it's white. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

editions.flavor:
"Since I cannot stop death, I choose to stop life."
—Kaervek

name: Soul's Attendant
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

editions.flavor: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

name: Soul-Scar Mage
text:
Prowess
If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a creature an opponent controls, put that many -1/-1 counters on that creature instead.

name: Soulscour
text: Destroy all nonartifact permanents.

editions.flavor:
"I have seen the end of times, a future in which all our kind are torn from this world."
—Ushanti, leonin shaman

name: Soul Scourge
text:
Flying
When Soul Scourge enters the battlefield, target player loses 3 life.
When Soul Scourge leaves the battlefield, that player gains 3 life.

name: Soul Sculptor
text: {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.

editions.flavor: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?

name: Soul Seizer
text:
Flying
When Soul Seizer deals combat damage to a player, you may transform it. If you do, attach it to target creature that player controls.

name: Soul Separator
text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul Separator: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. Create a black Zombie creature token with power equal to that card's power and toughness equal to that card's toughness.

name: Soul's Fire
text: Target creature you control on the battlefield deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: An avatar he sculpts of anger and flame.

name: Soul's Grace
text: You gain life equal to target creature's power.

editions.flavor: An avatar he sculpts of fellowship and light.

name: Soul Shepherd
text: {W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: You gain 1 life.

editions.flavor:
"The sidar who raised me had a saying: ‘The first step into death is the hardest.'"
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Soul Shred
text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

editions.flavor: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

name: Soulshriek
text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.flavor:
"The flesh is a casket for the soul."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Soul's Majesty
text: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

editions.flavor: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

name: Soul's Might
text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.

editions.flavor: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

name: Soul Snare
text: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.

editions.flavor:
"Body and spirit are sworn enemies. They will take any excuse to be rid of each other."
—Tariel, Reckoner of Souls

name: Soul Snuffers
text: When Soul Snuffers enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

editions.flavor: They once sought to unite with the flame of transcendence. Now they seek only to extinguish the lights of others.

name: Souls of the Faultless
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.

editions.flavor:
"More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

name: Soul Spike
text:
You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay Soul Spike's mana cost.
Soul Spike deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

name: Soul Stair Expedition
text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Soul Stair Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Soul Stair Expedition and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Soulstinger
text:
When Soulstinger enters the battlefield, put two -1/-1 counters on target creature you control.
When Soulstinger dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature for each -1/-1 counter on Soulstinger.

name: Soul Strings
text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.

editions.flavor: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

name: Soul Summons
text: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

editions.flavor: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.
Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.

name: Soulsurge Elemental
text:
First strike
Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.

editions.flavor: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.

name: Soul Swallower
text:
Trample
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, put three +1/+1 counters on Soul Swallower.

editions.flavor: Being engulfed is just the beginning of the nightmare.

name: Soulsworn Jury
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Soulsworn Jury: Counter target creature spell.

editions.flavor: In death, as in life, they protect the Grand Arbiter from exposure to contrary points of view.

name: Soulsworn Spirit
text:
Soulsworn Spirit can't be blocked.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

name: Soultether Golem
text:
Vanishing 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a time counter on Soultether Golem.

name: Soul Tithe
text:
Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless he or she pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Soul Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

editions.flavor:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching
"One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching

—Vec teaching
"One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching
"One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

name: Sound the Call
text: Create a 1/1 green Wolf creature token. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."

editions.flavor:
"If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter
Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.
While defending their southern borders, both the Wu and Shu kingdoms fought against the barbarians' trained elephants.
While defending their southern borders, both the Wu and Shu kingdoms fought against the barbarians' trained elephants.

name: Southern Paladin
text: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.

editions.flavor:
"How can anyone fight so much yet enjoy it so little?"
—The Western Paladin

"Look to the south; there you will find peace and serenity."
—The Book of Tal

name: Sovereigns of Lost Alara
text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may search your library for an Aura card that could enchant that creature, put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature, then shuffle your library.

name: Sovereign's Realm
text:
(Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Your deck can't have basic land cards and your starting hand size is five.
Exile a card from your hand: This turn, you may play basic land cards from outside the game.
Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

name: Sower of Temptation
text:
Flying
When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.

name: Sowing Salt
text: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Spare from Evil
text: Creatures you control gain protection from non-Human creatures until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"As long as we can utter a prayer or lift a weapon, we have the power to fight back."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Sparkcaster
text:
When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.

name: Spark Elemental
text:
Trample, haste (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

editions.set: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
editions.flavor: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.
Vulshok shamans summon spark elementals to burn paths through thick underbrush—or through goblin salvage squads.
Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.

name: Spark Fiend
text:
When Spark Fiend comes into play, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 2, 3, or 12, sacrifice Spark Fiend. On a total of 7 or 11, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. If you roll any other total, note it.
During your upkeep, roll two six-sided dice. On a total of 7, sacrifice Spark Fiend. If you roll the noted total, do not roll dice for Spark Fiend during any of your following upkeep phases. On any other roll, there is no effect.

name: Spark Jolt
text: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

editions.flavor: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.

name: Spark Mage
text: Whenever Spark Mage deals combat damage to a player, you may have Spark Mage deal 1 damage to target creature that player controls.

editions.flavor: The Pardic Mountains are known for their spicy cuisine.

name: Sparkmage Apprentice
text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Sparkmages are performance artists of sorts, but pain is the price of admission.
Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.
Sparkmages are performance artists of sorts, but pain is the price of admission.

name: Sparkmage's Gambit
text: Sparkmage's Gambit deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

editions.flavor:
"A touch of lightning, and anyone can be taught to dance."
—Tobin, sparkmage

name: Spark of Creativity
text: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"To invent is to rebel."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Sparksmith
text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

editions.flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"
"If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

name: Sparkspitter
text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

name: Spark Spray
text:
Spark Spray deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor: It's the only kind of shower goblins will tolerate.
It's the only kind of shower goblins will tolerate.

name: Spark Trooper
text:
Trample, lifelink, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

editions.flavor: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

name: Sparring Collar
text:
Equipped creature has first strike.
{R}{R}: Attach Sparring Collar to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Sparring Golem
text: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

editions.flavor: "Part drill sergeant, part training dummy," thought Gerrard. "I hope it can stand up to a real war."

name: Sparring Mummy
text: When Sparring Mummy enters the battlefield, untap target creature.

editions.flavor: Aspiring to earn their place in the afterlife, acolytes train every day against those who fell short of that glory.

name: Spatial Binding
text: Pay 1 life: Until your next upkeep, target permanent can't phase out.

editions.flavor:
Time is the one shackle you can't break.
—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Spatial Contortion
text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"For those without the Planeswalker spark, the merest touch of the Blind Eternities can kill."
—Ugin

name: Spatial Merging
text: When you encounter Spatial Merging, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

name: Spatula of the Ages
text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Spatula of the Ages: Put into play from your hand any card from an Unglued supplement.

editions.flavor:
At last Urza's powers were focused through the incredible artifact.
"Who wants pancakes?" he asked.

name: Spawnbinder Mage
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Tap target creature.

editions.flavor: "Follow me. Step lightly. And resist the urge to kick them."

name: Spawnbroker
text: When Spawnbroker enters the battlefield, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.

editions.flavor: "The trick isn't setting up the bad trade. It's making each side think it got the better deal."

name: Spawning Bed
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Create three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: Young Eldrazi crawl forth from the dust, compelled by a greater will.
